target_audience: Health-conscious individuals aged 25-45, fitness enthusiasts, and wellness seekers

products.name: Omega-3 Premium Capsules
products.prompt: Premium omega-3 fish oil supplement bottle with soft gel capsules visible through clear container, sleek modern packaging design, professional product photography on white background, studio lighting, high-end wellness product aesthetic
products.negative_prompt: blurry, low quality, distorted, watermark, text overlay, cluttered background, amateur photography

products.name: Plant Protein Powder - Vanilla
products.prompt: Premium plant-based protein powder container with vanilla flavor, modern minimalist packaging design, large resealable tub with scoop visible, professional studio photography on clean white background, premium wellness brand aesthetic
products.negative_prompt: blurry, low resolution, distorted, watermark, busy background, cheap looking, pixelated

products.name: Vitality Energy Bar - Dark Chocolate
products.prompt: Premium nutrition energy bar with dark chocolate coating, partially unwrapped showing texture and layers, modern sleek wrapper design, professional food photography on white background, appetizing presentation, high-end health food product
products.negative_prompt: blurry, unappetizing, messy, low quality, watermark, distorted, artificial looking, stock photo feel
